thread.title: To kick off our fifth decade, watch how NewsHour has evolved
thread.title_full: Video: To kick off our fifth decade, watch how NewsHour has evolved | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: To kick off our fifth decade, watch how NewsHour has evolved
text: In our NewsHour shares moment of the day, we celebrate the NewsHour’s 40th birthday with look at how we’ve evolved since that very first broadcast.
